docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: On this day 10 years ago, Joann Hale was seven and a half months pregnant and ''crying like a baby'' on the living room floor of her home on 99th Street here, in the neighborhood known as Love Canal.

headline.main: After 10 Years, the Trauma of Love Canal Continues

docs.snippet: LEAD: On this day 10 years ago, Joann Hale was seven and a half months pregnant and ''crying like a baby'' on the living room floor of her home on 99th Street here, in the neighborhood known as Love Canal.
